series_title: American Association of State highway and Transportation Officials (AASHTO) Specifications
series_description: This series documents American Association of State Highway and Transportation Officials(AASHTO) specifications for highway bridges that are provided to consultants and internal designers. This series may include but is not limited to: plan enhancements, modifications, and clarifications.
This series documents marked up versions of the Bridge Plans within a database . This series may include, but is not limited to: as-builts/plans and original signed title sheets.
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents work performed to design and a bridge or structure. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, operational check lists, plans,calculations, foundation design recommendations, bridge data sheet, layout sheet, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_title: Bridge Division: Project Records for Specialty Structures
series_description: This series documents the design and construction of specialty structures such as tunnels, movable bridges, cable-stayed structures, and segmental bridges. This series may include but is not limited to: correspondence, contract documents, preliminary plans, product information, calculations and specifications

series_title: Bridge, Culvert, and Overhead Inspection Reports
series_description: This series documents the physical inspection process for both above water and underwater bridges, including moveable bridges, culverts, and overhead structures. This series may include but is not limited to: reports, drawings, photographs, correspondence
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents load rating analysis of bridges. This series may include but is not limited to: data files and summary reports.
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents critical recommendations for posting, repair and strengthening forms. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_title: National Bridge Inspection Standards (NBIS) Compliance Review Reports
series_description: This series documents the agency's compliance status with National Bridge Inspection Standards (NBIS) requirements. series may include, but is not limited to: working papers and prepared reports

This series documents navigational requirements and the process of obtaining approvals from the U.S. Coast guard to build bridges crossing navigable waterways. This series may include but is not limited to: permits and supporting documentation.

This series documents the process for permitting vehicles to haul overweight and/or oversized loads. This series may include, but is not limited to: advisory data, approvals, denials, speed-restriction data, load capacity, and alternate routes.
This series documents shop drawings that are created electronically.
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents structure inventory data from the Maintenance System that serves as the required Bridge Inventory. This series may include but is not limited to: inventories and supporting documentatio
retention_statement: 0 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use
